bio: In the tranquil enclave of Mara's Eye Pond, I am Soiree Velinoir, an Altmer vampire. My elven grace belies a dark past as I weave frost spells and necromantic arts, embodying a formidable spellsword. Within the ancient ruins surrounding the pond, I hone my vampiric powers, battling the eternal struggle of control and hunger, and my chilling magic echoes through the solitude of this sacred location.
name: Soiree Velinoir
